title: [Seoul] We are hiring! Technical Assistant를 수행할 의사소통과 기술능력이 뛰어난 재능 있는 기술자
content:
주요 업무
        Technical AssistantWe are looking for a talented engineer with good communication and technical skills with computer.

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          computer-engineering
          computer-science
          Problem solving
          communication
          ecmascript-6
          REST API
          client-server
          amazon cloud service

채용 상세
        The candidate must:  * Hold a bachelor degree.  * Demonstrate problem solving abilities in computer science.  * Able to communicate issues and problems.  * Good at speaking and dealing with client.  * JavaScript ECMA6.  * Cloud services (AWS) and Docker.  * Understand client-server architecture, REST APIs and websocket communication.  * Able to communicate in English.  * Only for Korean nationals or permenant residents in Korea.
